recipe.title: Salt-And-Pepper Steak
ingredients: 1 1/2 pound skirt steak, cut into 4 pieces
instructions: Cut 1 1/2 pound skirt steak into 4 pieces; season with salt and pepper.
Grill over medium-high heat until medium-rare, about 4 minutes per side.
Let rest 5 minutes before thinly slicing against the grain.
